art.author: god's_teenager
art.post: Some  say the book is false, others believe it, I don’t know, and honestly, I don’t trust everything, and  I don’t worship an image, so the looks of Jesus doesn’t matter to me. Any way, when I see him in heaven one day, I’ll truly know, I probably won’t care because I’ll be thanking and worshiping god,
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
